existing_features.title: Update the global UI theme so the primary brand color is navy blue (not green) across light and dark modes, including primary/ring/sidebar variables and any custom gradient/outline styles that currently use the green hue.
Update PWA/browser theme metadata colors to match the new navy blue theme color.

new_feature_requests.summary: Change the app theme color from green to navy blue

projectName: Change app theme color from green to navy blue
